metadata.title: USN-6374-2 -- Mutt vulnerabilities
metadata.description: USN-6374-1 fixed vulnerabilities in Mutt. This update provides the corresponding updates for Ubuntu 23.10.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Mutt incorrectly handled certain email header  contents. If a user were tricked into opening a specially crafted message,  a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of  service. (CVE-2023-4874, CVE-2023-4875)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6374-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mutt - 2.2.9-1ubuntu0.23.10.1 No subscription required
